title: As some countries welcome Afghan refugees, others are trying to keep them out
content:
1. As some countries welcome Afghan refugees, others are trying to keep them out  The Washington Post
  2. Gravitas: Taliban claims it can fix 'dismantled' U.S. Aircraft  WION
  3. India holds first formal talks with the Taliban in Qatar  CNBC
  4. Opinion | Afghan refugees will know indifference, bigotry — and also kindness — in America. They will also make it better.  The Washington Post
  5. Opinion | Afghanistan May Forever Be the Graveyard of Empires  Common Dreams
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アフガン難民を歓迎する国がある一方で、難民を排除しようとする国もあります。
在一些国家欢迎阿富汗难民的同时，其他国家却试图将他们拒之门外
在一些國家歡迎阿富汗難民的同時，其他國家卻試圖將他們拒之門外
